abstract: Although several of the nation’s biggest banks reported some of their best results ever this week, investors are worried about tougher times ahead.
snippet: Although several of the nation’s biggest banks reported some of their best results ever this week, investors are worried about tougher times ahead.
lead_paragraph: The jittery credit markets made investors sweat this week as the country’s biggest banks reported second-quarter earnings. But Wall Street’s message was served up like a cold glass of lemonade: Relax, we’ll work through this even as we put away more money to cover future loan losses.

headline.main: Big Banks Offer Assurances to Calm Investors’ Jitters
headline.print_headline: Big Banks Offer Assurances To Calm Investors’ Jitters
